movie.management.web.resource

类 MovieResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • movie.management.web.resource.MovieResource

  • @Path(value="/movieService")
public class MovieResource
extends Object
    Resource class for managing movies and actors.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      MovieResource() 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Response addActor(Actor actor)
      Adds a new actor to the service.
      Response addMovie(Movie movie)
      Adds a new movie to the service.
      Response getMovieByTitle(String title)
      Retrieves a movie by its title.
      Response getMovies()
      Retrieves all movies.
      Response getMoviesByActorName(String name)
      Retrieves movies by an actor's name.
      Response linkMovieToActor(Integer movieId, Integer actorId)

    • 方法详细资料

      • addMovie

        @POST
 @Path(value="/addMovie")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public Response addMovie(Movie movie)
        Adds a new movie to the service.
        参数:
        movie - The movie to be added.
        返回:
        A Response object with the result of the addition.

      • addActor

        @POST
 @Path(value="/addActor")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public Response addActor(Actor actor)
        Adds a new actor to the service.
        参数:
        actor - The actor to be added.
        返回:
        A Response object with the result of the addition.

      • linkMovieToActor

        @POST
 @Path(value="/link")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public Response linkMovieToActor(@QueryParam(value="movieId")
                                                                                                                                           Integer movieId,
                                                                                                                                           @QueryParam(value="actorId")
                                                                                                                                           Integer actorId)
        Links a movie to an actor.
        参数:
        movieId - The ID of the movie.
        actorId - The ID of the actor.
        返回:
        A Response object indicating the success or failure of the operation.

      • getMovieByTitle

        @GET
 @Path(value="/getMovieByTitle")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public Response getMovieByTitle(@QueryParam(value="title")
                                                                                                              String title)
        Retrieves a movie by its title.
        参数:
        title - The title of the movie.
        返回:
        A Response object with the movie information or an error status if not found.

      • getMovies

        @GET
 @Path(value="/getMovies")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public Response getMovies()
        Retrieves all movies.
        返回:
        A Response object containing a list of all movies.

      • getMoviesByActorName

        @GET
 @Path(value="/getMoviesByActorName")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public Response getMoviesByActorName(@QueryParam(value="name")
                                                                                                                        String name)
        Retrieves movies by an actor's name.
        参数:
        name - The name of the actor.
        返回:
        A Response object containing the movies associated with the actor or an error status if not found.
